description.narrative: Output 39 Programme Coordination : processes are strengthened in the UNICEF Accra and Tamale offices to support planning, implementation, coordination and monitoring of UNICEF supported activities.,which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 011: Cross cutting and programme coordination
